data.record: Describe the technical support process.  How do you submit issues, receive help, etc…
One of the best ways to avoid delay in timelines is to brainstorm at the beginning of the project. Ask the team, “What will break during this process?”
Let’s face it, the chances that your boss is a Steve Jobs visionary are pretty slim, despite what they might think of themselves.

data.record: It behooves developers and product managers to have security built into the development lifecycle and built into their go-to-market strategies, including any security certifications and/or other industry requirements
it’s important to define your target audience before launching your new software

data.issue: This type of bug occurs when the system fails to perform as expected. For example, if a website is supposed to allow users to submit their taxes online, but instead causes them to receive an error message, this would qualify as a faulty functionality bug.
data.title: Faulty Functionality

data.issue: If links on a website don't work or take users to the wrong page, this would be considered a broken link bug.
data.title: Broken Links

data.issue: If data entered into a system is incorrect or incomplete, this could lead to problems in functionality.
data.title: Incorrect Data

data.issue: If important elements of a system are missing or not properly configured, this can create difficulties for users.
data.title: Missing Information

data.issue: Bugs that occur when different pieces of software don't work together correctly are known  as incompatible software bugs.
data.title: Incompatible Software

data.issue: Any bug that allows someone unauthorized access to data or systems is classified as a security bug.
data.title: Security Bugs

data.issue: What are the best features and limitations?
data.title: Product Questions

data.issue: How responsive is the vendor to issues?
data.title: Implementation and Support

data.issue: What was the total cost of ownership (software, hardware, services, training, etc…)?
data.title: Wrap-up Question

data.title: Quality

data.issue: You need to find ways to make your product compatible using application program interfaces (APIs) or partnering with these other tech brands on ways to work together
data.title: Integration

data.issue: Every member has to know a project’s coding strategy, objective and goals. Otherwise, the fallout affects the manager’s reputation and the team’s output
data.title: Communication Breakdowns

data.issue: One of the best ways to avoid delay in timelines is to brainstorm at the beginning of the project. Ask the team, “What will break during this process?”
data.title: Unrealistic Or Mismanaged Timelines

data.issue: be more specialized rather than more general—look for sub-niches. Remember, less is more when we are trying to solve a problem. -
data.title: Feature Overload

data.issue: Let’s face it, the chances that your boss is a Steve Jobs visionary are pretty slim, despite what they might think of themselves.
data.title: Lack Of Alignment Between Sponsor And User Needs

data.issue: Save yourself some time and hardship by scheduling in some extra cushion time in case it is needed. In the worst-case scenario, that space is used to conduct tests on the project or take some much-needed time off.
data.title: Underestimating The Task At Hand

data.issue: Businesses need to understand not just what a customer is asking for, but “why” they’re asking for this specifically. The driver of a horse and cart may ask for a better whip to go faster
data.title: Not Pinpointing The Real ‘Why’

data.issue: To obtain high-performing and secure products, code quality has to be reviewed and tested continuously throughout the development stages.
data.title: Quality Assurance

data.issue: The most effective way to combat this issue is to consistently and thoroughly conduct customer development interviews to validate each feature and make sure it meaningfully targets the issue you set out to solve.
data.title: Feature Creep

data.issue: It behooves developers and product managers to have security built into the development lifecycle and built into their go-to-market strategies, including any security certifications and/or other industry requirements
data.title: Security-Related Release Delays

data.issue: it’s important to define your target audience before launching your new software
data.title: Not Defining A Target Audience

data.issue: underestimate the volume of traffic their infrastructure may experience with the launch of a new product.
data.title: Underestimating The Demand
